O.description: Openness reflects imagination, curiosity, appreciation for art, emotional depth, and willingness to try new or unconventional ideas. High scorers tend to be creative, intellectually curious, and comfortable with abstract thinking. Low scorers prefer routine, familiarity, and traditional values.
sample_items: I am curious about many different things.
I have difficulty understanding abstract ideas. (reversed)

C.description: Conscientiousness reflects organization, responsibility, discipline, and reliability. High scorers tend to plan ahead, follow rules, and work hard to achieve goals. Low scorers are more spontaneous, flexible, and may struggle with organization or follow-through.
sample_items: I get chores done right away.

E.description: Extraversion reflects sociability, energy, assertiveness, and desire for stimulation. High scorers enjoy social interaction and seek excitement. Low scorers (introverts) prefer solitude, calm environments, and deep one-on-one interactions.
sample_items: I am the life of the party.

A.description: Agreeableness reflects compassion, cooperation, and concern for others. High scorers are empathetic, trustworthy, and eager to maintain harmony. Low scorers can be skeptical, competitive, or more self-interested.
sample_items: I take time out for others.

N.description: Neuroticism reflects emotional sensitivity, tendency toward anxiety, mood swings, and reactivity to stress. High scorers experience negative emotions more intensely. Low scorers (emotionally stable) remain calm, resilient, and less reactive.
